quest.name: Wonder-full
journal:
 Quest Sync
Despite appearances, Alkmene has a lot on her mind.
objectives: Survey flower beds and obtain aetherial masses.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Awww! Awen't you just adowable? Yes, yes you are!

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Hee hee! That's what I love about familiars─so whimsical! I have a task that is perfectly suited to one such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Hee hee! My apologies, dear─your whimsically diminutive stature misled me. Fortunately, I have a task perfectly suited to an oh-so-grown-up familiar such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: I would like you to inspect the flower beds north of here. I suspect they will have accumulated some aetherial masses.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Should you find any, please bring them to me. Do look carefully, now─if I needed someone to wander off with the task half-finished, I would have asked one of the other researchers.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Even if you see no aetherial masses at first glance, you must scrutinize the flower beds to make sure. I'm certain you can do it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though you examine the flower bed closely, there are no aetherial masses to be found.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: An aetherial mass floats over the flower bed, ripe for the picking. Probably.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Did you scrutinize every corner of the beds?

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: As I suspected─masses of earthen aspect.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: The gardens of the Twelve Wonders reflect the balance of dynamic and stagnant aether of all six aspects. An excess of activity in a single aspect leads to this type of agglomeration.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: 'Tis these flowers' way of bearing fruit, so to speak.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: Beautiful as that may sound, aetherial masses indicate that we must adjust the aetherial balance in Elpis to maintain an ideal environment.

dialogue.name: ALKMENE
dialogue.text: There's naught for you to worry your dear little head about, of course. Such magic is as simple as breathing for us. Run along, now!
